name: ejs-stuff
description: Some stuff relating to using EJS

scripts.install: npm i express ejs quickmongo bcrypt socket.io

author: Blocks_n_more

@comment dependencies.bcrypt: Needed for security with storing logins in a database
@comment dependencies.quickmongo/quickdb/quick-mysql: Quick and simple manager for db storing
@comment dependencies.socket.io: Add the ability to do live changes to the client ie notifications
